channel.title: CVE Feed for Pepper+Fuchs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pepper+Fuchs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-12513|2024-09-16T17:13:55.439Z -- pepper%2Bfuchs -- comtrol%20io-link%20master
item.description: Pepperl+Fuchs Comtrol IO-Link Master in Version 1.5.48 and below is prone to an authenticated blind OS Command Injection.

item.title: CVE-2021-20987|2024-09-16T16:23:03.443Z -- pepper%2Bfuchs -- pcv%2Fpxv%2Fpgv
item.description: A denial of service and memory corruption vulnerability was found in Hilscher EtherNet/IP Core V2 prior to V2.13.0.21that may lead to code injection through network or make devices crash without recovery.

item.title: CVE-2020-12514|2024-09-16T19:40:53.649Z -- pepper%2Bfuchs -- comtrol%20io-link%20master
item.description: Pepperl+Fuchs Comtrol IO-Link Master in Version 1.5.48 and below is prone to a NULL Pointer Dereference that leads to a DoS in discoveryd
